alert.note: Alert for Snohomish (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 05 at 4:44AM PST until December 05 at 10:47PM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Washington... North Fork Stillaguamish River Near Arlington affecting Snohomish County. Stillaguamish River At Arlington affecting Snohomish County. .Heavy rain will continue in the North Central Washington Cascades through this afternoon. Another 2 to 4 inches of rain is forecast before the rain eases late in the day. For the North West Region...including Arlington, Jordan Rd. Bridge, Arlington...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...North Fork Stillaguamish River near Arlington. * WHEN...From early this morning to late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, the North Fork Stillaguamish River will cause flooding in the Cicero and Swede Heaven areas...Oso Loop Road...and SR 530. Flood waters will also cause riverbank erosion. A stage of 14 feet corresponds to Phase 3 in the Snohomish County Flood Warning System. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:15 AM PST Tuesday the stage was 13.8 feet. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 4:15 AM PST Tuesday was 13.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 14.2 feet late this morning. It will then fall below flood stage this afternoon. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by this afternoon at 1245 PM PST.
